description: Try our easy to follow Spinach & Ricotta Cannelloni recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Spinach & Ricotta Cannelloni Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Combine sauce and 1/2 cup water in a bowl. Spoon over pasta rolls. Combine cheeses and sprinkle over. Bake for 30 minutes or until pasta is cooked through and cheese is golden. Stand for 10 minutes. Garnish with herbs. Serve with broccoli, if liked.
